name: Paragon

skills.name: Power Drain
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 10%. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Damage Control
skills.raw_description:
Places an [Unkillable] buff and a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on a target ally for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Life Shackles
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff and a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
